# Appear
<!--
@name: Appear
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/notimp.png" valign="center" alt="Not implemented" title="Not implemented" /></div>

Progressively draw one screen into another using a fading effect
## Parameters

- **sourceScreen**: Index of the source screen
- **destinationScreen**: Index of the destination screen
- **pixels**: Value used to perform the effect
- **range**: Range of the apparition in number of pixels (optional)
---
